title: Dynamic Workflow
tagLine: Dynamic workflows allow users to specify the next participants within an agreement.
creator: Nathan Nguyen, Todd Guerra, & Abhishek Dixet

keyFeature.title: Dynamic Routing
keyFeature.desc: Allows user to provide the next participant associated with the workflow.

keyFeature.title: Hide All Workflow w/ Predefined Recipients
keyFeature.desc: Allows the application to hide workflows with predefined recipients.

keyFeature.title: Expose Internal Workflow
keyFeature.desc: Allow external users to leverage your internal workflows.

content.content: Dynamic Workflows allows you to expose your internal workflow to external users. This allows you to leverage your existing workflows and allows you to create workflows that are more dynamic.
You can disable options such as reminders or deadlines to prevent users from changing the workflow.
You can also disable the dropdown allowing it to be a static workflow only
Your workflows can contain prefilled data, so that your user will not need to fill out the data.

installation.content: Dynamic Workflow is a standalone app built on React and Node. Please visit the Github page for installation instructions
